scripts.db:backup: docker exec -t directus_postgres pg_dump -U directus directus > backup.sql
scripts.db:restore: docker exec -i directus_postgres psql -U directus -d directus < backup.sql
scripts.schema:backup: docker exec -it directus_app npx directus schema snapshot ./backups/schema.yaml
scripts.schema:restore: docker exec -it directus_app npx directus schema apply ./backups/schema.yaml
